channel.title: Angel Devoid
channel.description: After playing Sky Roads and Kiloblaster, I've gone into a bout of nostalgia. One of my childhood favorites has to be Angel Devoid: Face of the Enemy, a point-and-click adventure game from '96. I've gotten rid of the disks long ago. So I was wondering if there was a free download or something available.

item.title: Angel Devoid
item.dc:creator: Hamst3r
item.description:
Haha, I have that game. It’s a 4 disc set. I got it way back when and it didn’t run on my computer, so I put the discs away and never tried again. I guess I should try it now with DosBox or something.

You can get it on ebay for under $5: https://shop.ebay.com/?_from=R40&_trksid=p3907.m38.l1313&_nkw=%22Angel+Devoid%22&_sacat=See-All-Categories

Read full topic

item.title: Angel Devoid
item.dc:creator: Winged_One
item.description:
After playing Sky Roads and Kiloblaster, I’ve gone into a bout of nostalgia. One of my childhood favorites has to be Angel Devoid: Face of the Enemy, a point-and-click adventure game from '96. I’ve gotten rid of the disks long ago. So I was wondering if there was a free download or something available.
